content: This price appreciation, coupled with a large commercial land sale in Summerlin had a meaningful impact on our first quarter results with MPC land sales of $61 million, marking a 64% increase versus the same period last year. In summary, during the first quarter, our MPCs generated land sales revenue of $61 million, a 64% increase over the first quarter of 2021 and $60 million of EBT, a 6% decrease compared to the prior year period.
